name: Samsung 65" S95D OLED Smart TV
description: 65-inch 4K OLED with anti-glare, Neural Quantum Processor, Dolby Atmos, 144Hz refresh rate. 2024 model.

name: Dyson V15 Detect Absolute Cordless Vacuum
description: Cordless stick vacuum with laser dust detection, piezo sensor particle counting, LCD screen showing real-time data. Up to 60 minutes runtime.

name: Shun Premier 8" Chef's Knife
description: 8-inch hand-sharpened Japanese chef's knife. VG-MAX cutting core with 68 layers of Damascus cladding. Walnut PakkaWood handle.
